title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets      Pets are often seen as members of the family and are brought on vacation. Unfortunately, with the exception of service animals, pets are prohibited in the visitor centers. For the trails at Nez Perce National Historical Park, dogs are allowed, but they must be on a leash at all times. Dogs are probibited on the trails at Big Hole National Battlefield and Bear Paw battlefield. Where pets are allowed, they must be on a leash at all times.
